import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import Navbar from './Navbar'; import Footer from './Footer'; import './ManageInvoice.css'; const ManageInvoice = () => { const [invoices, setInvoices] = useState([]); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { if (searchTerm.trim() === '') { // Fetch all invoices when search is empty fetch('http://localhost:8080/invoice/all') .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => setInvoices(data)) .catch(err => console.error('Error fetching invoices:', err)); } else { const invoiceNo = parseInt(searchTerm); if (!isNaN(invoiceNo)) { fetch(`http://localhost:8080/invoice/search/${invoiceNo}`) .then(res => { if (res.ok) return res.json(); else return []; }) .then(data => setInvoices(data)) .catch(err => { console.error('Error fetching invoice by number:', err); setInvoices([]); }); } } }, [searchTerm]); const handleSearchChange = (e) => { setSearchTerm(e.target.value); }; return (
Total Invoice: {invoices.length}
{invoices.map((inv, index) => ( ))}
# Company Chain ID Estimate ID Service Qty Rate Total Action
{inv.invoiceNo} {inv.chain.company_name} {inv.chain.chain_id} {inv.estimate.estimateId} {inv.serviceDetails} {inv.quantity} ₹{inv.costPerUnit} ₹{inv.amountPayable}
{/* Slide Panel */}
Edit Invoice
); }; export default ManageInvoice;
